author: Stephanie Armour
title: House Panel Probes Organizations that Accredit Most U.S. Hospitals
text:
The House Energy and Commerce Committee is investigating organizations that accredit most of the nationâ€™s hospitals following a report by The Wall Street Journal last year that identified patient safety problems at hospitals that had attained or kept their accreditations.

Committee leaders are seeking information from the Centers for Medicare and Medicare Services, or CMS, which oversees hospital accrediting organizations. They also sent letters Monday to four national accrediting organizations, requesting that they brief...
